purpose: Living document with proposed enhancements for the /common/ folder. Optimized for both AI parsing and collaborative iteration.

suggestions.title: Add Subfolders for Prototypes
suggestions.description: Introduce subfolders such as /dashboard-prototype/ and /ethics-framework/ with index.html entry points, allowing modular growth without cluttering the root of /common/.

suggestions.title: Create Metadata Registry
suggestions.description: Add a metadata.json file describing all artifacts in /common/, including file type, purpose, and intended audience (AI-facing vs teacher-facing).

suggestions.title: Interoperability with AI Participants
suggestions.description: Define a shared schema (JSON-based) so Grok, Claude, and ChatGPT-5 artifacts can cross-reference the same ARTI levels, Gy11/Gy25 mappings, and ethics guidelines.

suggestions.title: Versioning & Change Logs
suggestions.description: Introduce a CHANGELOG.md or changelog.json to document updates to shared resources, ensuring transparency across iterations.

suggestions.title: School & Teacher Feedback Loop
suggestions.description: Reserve space (e.g., /feedback/) for future inclusion of anonymized teacher/student input, so common resources reflect real classroom use cases.
